blogs.title: How to demonstrate quantum superposition of classical gravitational fields?
blogs.summary: There was rather interesting article in Nature  (see this)  by Marletto and Vedral about the possibility of demonstrating the quantum nature of gravitational fields by using weak  measurement of classical gravitational field affecting  it only very weakly.
